name: Doodles
description:
Welcome to Doodles!

This is a relatively small project of mine, but I hope y'all will enjoy it!

There's not much to do in this game. All you have to do is just press 1 from 9 to see the creative patterns I've coded.

Pretty simple, right? You can also press [M] to open a visual setting where you can change some of the game performance indexes. Just click on a category and insert your favored number.

But wait, there's more!

Press O and you'll find what makes the game enjoyable! You can create your very own patterns by entering different values! Click once to start modifying the variables

Some other cool features include timer manipulation (press [T] to see the timer (an important factor of the game), and click the clock to set its value), pausing, and more! Press [H] will show you a list of available actions.

Thank you for playing!
